Name: Hidden Object - Tools
About the game: This wonderful hidden object game gives you the unique opportunity to find amazing hidden tools with beautiful scenes with animation. Features - Beautiful high-quality images - Animation - Addictive Hidden Object gameplay - Catchy sound effects and music! - Differences randomized on each play - Hints if you get stuck - Try to score the Highest score!
